If the value of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/keySpace] property is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataKeySpace/common], this property value contains the same key as the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/key] property.

# commonKey

**Instance Property**

The common key of the metadata item.

## Declaration

```swift
var commonKey: AVMetadataKey? { get }
```

## Discussion

This value contains the key that most closely corresponds to the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/key] property, but that belongs to the common key space. You can use this key to locate metadata items irrespective of the underlying media format.

If the value of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/keySpace] property is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataKeySpace/common], this property value contains the same key as the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/key] property.

## Accessing keys and key spaces

- **key**: The key of the metadata item.
- **keySpace**: The key space for the metadata item’s key.
